meanings.definition: The quality or state of being smoky.
meanings.sent1: The smokiness of the room made it hard to see.
meanings.sent2: I love the smokiness of barbecue ribs.
meanings.sent3: The smokiness of the campfire made everyone smell like bacon.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a mysterious smokiness that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The smokiness of the forest fire filled the air with a thick haze.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a smoky flavor or aroma.
meanings.sent1: The chef added extra smokiness to the dish with hickory wood.
meanings.sent2: The smokiness of the whiskey lingered on my palate.
meanings.sent3: The smokiness of the bacon was so strong, it woke up the entire house.
meanings.sent4: The smokiness of the incense brought back memories of a distant temple.
meanings.sent5: The smokiness of the barbecue filled the backyard with a mouth-watering scent.
